thread.title_full: Tenn. Pastor, 53, 'tied up and raped high school girl, 18' | Daily Mail Online

author: James Wilkinson For Dailymail.Com
title: Tenn. Pastor, 53, 'tied up and raped high school girl, 18' | Daily Mail Online
text: Married Baptist pastor and teacher's assistant, 53, 'tied 18-year-old student to a hook in his garage ceiling before raping her' Mike Ulmer, 53, allegedly took the girl from her Tennessee school to his home She says he tied up her hands, looped the rope through a hook, then raped her He is a teaching assistant at Chester County High, which she attends She says she sometimes works at his Henderson home as a cleaner Ulmer, who is married, has pleaded not guilty and is currently out on bond Published: 19:46 GMT, 23 February 2017 | Updated: 22:42 GMT, 23 February 2017 200 shares
